Method Detail

showActionBar

public static View showActionBar(Activity parent,
                                 View original,
                                 Entity entity)
Attaches the Socialize action bar to an existing view. The ActionBar will be pinned to the bottom of the view.

Parameters:
parent - The activity containing the view.
original - The original View to which the ActionBar will be pinned.
entity - The entity associated with the ActionBar.
Returns:
The final view including the ActionBar which can then be attached to your layout.

showActionBar

public static View showActionBar(Activity parent,
                                 int resId,
                                 Entity entity)
Attaches the Socialize action bar to an existing view. The ActionBar will be pinned to the bottom of the view.

Parameters:
parent - The activity containing the view.
resId - The resource ID of the original View (layout) to which the ActionBar will be pinned.
entity - The entity associated with the ActionBar.
Returns:
The final view including the ActionBar which can then be attached to your layout.

showActionBar

public static View showActionBar(Activity parent,
                                 int resId,
                                 Entity entity,
                                 ActionBarOptions options,
                                 ActionBarListener listener)
Attaches the Socialize action bar to an existing view. The ActionBar will be pinned to the bottom of the view.

Parameters:
parent - The activity containing the view.
resId - The resource ID of the original View (layout) to which the ActionBar will be pinned.
entity - The entity associated with the ActionBar.
options - Display option for the action bar (may be null)
listener - A listener to handle ActionBar events (may be null)
Returns:
The final view including the ActionBar which can then be attached to your layout.

showActionBar

public static View showActionBar(Activity parent,
                                 View original,
                                 Entity entity,
                                 ActionBarOptions options,
                                 ActionBarListener listener)
Attaches the Socialize action bar to an existing view. The ActionBar will be pinned to the bottom of the view.

Parameters:
parent - The activity containing the view.
original - The original View to which the ActionBar will be pinned.
entity - The entity associated with the ActionBar.
options - Display option for the action bar (may be null)
listener - A listener to handle ActionBar events (may be null)
Returns:
The final view including the ActionBar which can then be attached to your layout.
